photoalbum

photoalbum.model.data
 
  • Classes in photoalbum.model.data used by photoalbum
    Class
    Description
    Persistence
    Handles the persistence layer of the photo album application, managing the saving and loading of user and album data to and from the disk.
  • Classes in photoalbum.model.data used by photoalbum.gui.controller
    Class
    Description
    Album
    Represents an album in the photo album application, holding a collection of photos and related details.
    Photo
    Represents a photograph in the photo album application, including its metadata such as tags and caption.
  • Classes in photoalbum.model.data used by photoalbum.model.accounts
    Class
    Description
    Album
    Represents an album in the photo album application, holding a collection of photos and related details.
    Photo
    Represents a photograph in the photo album application, including its metadata such as tags and caption.
    Tag
    A record for a tag associated with a photo, which includes a name and a value.
